timeline.bodyText: When breaking up a line at an operator boundary, the guidelines say to move the operator to the beginning of the continuation line, rather than leaving it the end of the line before the break.
timeline.author: KevinGilmore

timeline.bodyText: Same as above regarding placement of the operators.
